text: Ara yadi kono nari tara sbamira kacha theke asanka kare durbyabahara athaba barjana, tabe tadera ubhayera dosa habe na yadi tara ubhayera madhye bujhapara kaâ€™re punarmilana ghatate pare. Ara aposa-mimansa kalyanakara. Ara manera madhye bartamana thake lalasa. Ara yadi tomara bhalo karo o bhayasrad'dha karo, tabe nihsandeha tomara ya karo se sanbandhe allah hacchena cira oyakiphahala.
